sentence.Network_en: The land sweeps away from long areas of greenery.
sentence.Network_cn: 这块地从草木茂盛的狭长地带一直伸展开来。

sentence.Network_en: The room was decorated with flowers and greenery.
sentence.Network_cn: 屋里装点着花卉和绿叶植物。

sentence.Network_en: They have ordered a bit of greenery to brighten up the new wing at Guy's Hospital.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们订购了一些绿色植物，以给盖伊医院的新配楼增添一抹亮色。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... spinnery 纺纱厂 greenery 花房，温室 goosery 养鹅场.

entry.def: Plants that make a place look attractive are referred to as greenery .

example.ex: They have ordered a bit of greenery to brighten up the new wing at Guy's Hospital.
example.tran: 他们订购了一些绿色植物，以给盖伊医院的新配楼增添一抹亮色。

auth_sentence.content: The more greenery versus hard surfaces, the better.
auth_sentence.res_content: The more greenery versus hard surfaces, the better.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The more greenery versus hard surfaces, the better.

auth_sentence.content: But the party seems to have gone yellow on greenery.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the party seems to have gone yellow on greenery.

auth_sentence.content: The room was a veritable jungle of greenery and flowers.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"行为,情况"; 2. 表名词,"场所,地点"

stems_affixes.word_buile: brave勇敢的+ery行为,情况→n.[U]英勇,勇敢;勇气
bribe贿赂+ery行为,情况→n.贿赂的行为
chicane诈骗+ery行为,情况→n.欺诈,欺骗
ef出+front前面+ery行为,情况→脸面出去→不要脸
robb=rob抢+ery行为,情况→n.抢劫,劫掠,盗取
trick诡计+ery行为,情况→n.欺骗,诡计
bake烤+ery场所,地点→烤[面包]的地方
cemet睡觉+ery场所,地点→n.坟墓,墓地,坟场
green绿色+ery场所,地点→n.温室,草木
monast一个人住+ery场所,地点→n.男修道院,僧院
nurse养育,护理+ery场所,地点→nursery托儿所
